'''Book''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
*{{ItemLink|Book}}, the standard book used in several crafting recipes.
*{{ItemLink|Book and Quill}}, the book the player can write in.
*{{ItemLink|Written Book}}, the item produced after a book and quill is signed.
*{{ItemLink|Enchanted Book}}, books used in an anvil to apply an enchantment to an item.
*{{ItemLink|Knowledge Book}}, utility item that grant crafting recipes when used.
*{{ItemLink|Portfolio}}, a book that documents the pictures taken from camera in ''Minecraft Education''.
*[[Recipe book]], a mechanic in ''Minecraft'' that helps to guide the player when crafting items.
*[[Minecraft books]], physical guidebooks for ''Minecraft'' written by various authors.

*{{MCD|Books}}, physical books for {{MCD}} written by various authors.
